targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "applications")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.node and r.node != "")
  |> keep(columns: ["node"])
  |> group(columns: [])                 // single table
  |> distinct(column: "node")
  |> count()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "node_count"})

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "applications")
  |> keep(columns: ["pod"])          // ensure we keep the tag
  |> group(columns: [])              // single table
  |> distinct(column: "pod")         // outputs a column named _value
  |> count()                         // counts rows in _value
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "pod_count"})

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
       r._measurement == "infrastructure" and
       r._field       == "cpu_pct" and
       r.node         == "${node}"
     )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with combined_label: r.node }))
  |> keep(columns: ["combined_label", "_value"])

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
       r._measurement == "infrastructure" and
       r._field       == "mem_pct" and
       r.node         == "${node}"
     )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with combined_label: r.node }))
  |> keep(columns: ["combined_label", "_value"])

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "applications")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.node and r.node != "")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["pod","node"])
  |> group(columns: ["node"])
  |> distinct(column: "pod")
  |> count()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Running pods"})
  |> duplicate(column: "node", as: "Name")
  |> keep(columns: ["Name", "Running pods"])
  |> group(columns: [])         // single table
  |> sort(columns: ["Name"])

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "applications" and r._field == "cpu_mcores"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.pod and exists r.node and r.node != "")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["pod", "node"])
  |> group(columns: [])
  |> sort(columns: ["pod", "node"])
  |> rename(columns: {pod: "Name", node: "Running node"})

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
       r._measurement == "infrastructure" and
       r._field       == "cpu_cores" and
       r.node         == "${node}"
     )
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "cpu_cores" })

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
       r._measurement == "infrastructure" and
       r._field       == "alloc_cpu_cores" and
       r.node         == "${node}"
     )
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "alloc_cpu_cores" })

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
       r._measurement == "infrastructure" and
       r._field       == "mem_gb" and
       r.node         == "${node}"
     )
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "mem_gb" })

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
       r._measurement == "infrastructure" and
       r._field       == "alloc_mem_gb" and
       r.node         == "${node}"
     )
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "alloc_mem_gb" })

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
       r._measurement == "applications" and
       r._field       == "cpu_mcores" and
       r.pod          =~ /${pod:regex}/
     )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with combined_label: r.pod }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "combined_label"])
  |> group(columns: ["combined_label"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> yield(name: "pod_cpu_mcores")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
       r._measurement == "applications" and
       (r._field == "net_rx_bytes" or r._field == "net_tx_bytes") and
       r.pod =~ /${pod:regex}/
     )
  // keep RX and TX as separate series per pod
  |> group(columns: ["pod", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)     // bytes/s
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 }))  // bits/s
  // sum RX+TX together for each pod at each timestamp
  |> group(columns: ["pod", "_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["pod"])
  |> yield(name: "pod_network_total_bps")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
       r._measurement == "applications" and
       (r._field == "net_rx_bytes" or r._field == "net_tx_bytes") and
       r.pod =~ /${pod:regex}/
     )
  |> group(columns: ["pod", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
       _time:  r._time,
       _value: r._value * 8.0,
       _field: r.pod + " " + (if r._field == "net_tx_bytes" then "TX" else "RX")
     }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> yield(name: "pod_network_throughput_bps")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "video_metrics" and
    r._field == "bandwidth_mbps"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
    r with stream_label: r.stream
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "stream_label"])
  |> group(columns: ["stream_label"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> yield(name: "video_bandwidth")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "video_metrics" and
    r._field == "fps"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with stream_label: r.stream
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "stream_label"])
  |> group(columns: ["stream_label"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> yield(name: "video_fps")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "latency_ms")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      combined_label: r.target + " [" + r.ip + "]"
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "combined_label"])
  |> group(columns: ["combined_label"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> yield(name: "ping_latency")

import "strings"

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
       r._measurement == "network_io" and
       (r._field == "rx_bytes" or r._field == "tx_bytes") and
       contains(value: r.interface, set: ${interface:json})
     )
  |> group(columns: ["interface", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(column: "_value", usePrevious: true)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
       _time:  r._time,
       _value: r._value * 8.0,
       _field: r.interface + " " + (if r._field == "tx_bytes" then "TX" else "RX")
     }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> yield(name: "net_interface_throughput_bps")
SELECT "value"  *8 FROM "udpStats" WHERE ("port_id" >= ${gold_portrange_min} AND flow_id<>'20000' AND "port_id" < ${gold_portrange_min}+${flowcount}) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "flow_id"
SELECT "value"  *8 FROM "udpStats" WHERE ("port_id" >= ${gold_portrange_min} AND flow_id='20000' AND "port_id" < ${gold_portrange_min}+${flowcount}) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "flow_id"
SELECT "value"  *8 FROM "udpStats" WHERE ("port_id" >= ${silver_portrange_min} AND flow_id<>'22000'  AND "port_id" < ${silver_portrange_min}+${flowcount}) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "flow_id"
SELECT "value"  *8 FROM "udpStats" WHERE ("port_id" >= ${silver_portrange_min} AND flow_id='22000'  AND "port_id" < ${silver_portrange_min}+${flowcount}) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "flow_id"
SELECT "thr" FROM "thr_pp" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "flow_id"

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "monitoring",
  tag:    "node",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "infrastructure"
)
list.label: K8s Node
list.name: node

query.query:

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "monitoring",
  tag:    "node",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "infrastructure"
)
